peer
Class UDPPeer

java.lang.Object
  peer.UDPPeer

public class UDPPeer
extends java.lang.Object

UDP Peer implementation. Code taken from IDIST3 lecture notes (supplied by bhc) and modified to suit this project.

Author:
Lasse

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Starts a client and server which enables communication with other discovered peers in the network.

sendMessages

public static void sendMessages(java.net.InetAddress ip,
                                java.lang.String query)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Sends a UDP message to the supplied IP address with the given data. Responses will be converted to string and send to command controller

Parameters:
ip - IP address to send UDP packet to.
query - Data to send.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getAlivePeer

private static java.net.InetAddress getAlivePeer()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Opens the default "peers" text file and pings the IP address. If it responds we return the IP to the calling method. Cleans up the peers text file, so that it only contains alive peers.

Returns:
IP address of pingable peer
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
